item.title: Docker - Instalac√£o
item.description: Requisitos Ubuntu Linux 18.04 ou superior Procedimento Instalando docker sudo apt-get remove docker docker-engine docker.io containerd runc sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg-agent \ software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo add-apt-repository \ "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu \ $(lsb_release -cs)\ stable" sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io sudo docker run hello-world Instalando docker-compose sudo curl -L "https://github.
